publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3338 Hugh O’Donnell: Airdrie Citizens Advice Bureau Award—That the Parliament congratulates the committee, volunteers and staff of Airdrie Citizens Advice Bureau, which has recently been awarded the Scottish Standards Accreditation certificate by the Scottish Government for excellence in delivering advice in three areas, housing, money and welfare benefits; acknowledges the value of its free, independent and high-standard services at a time when applications for help from members of the public are increasing substantially because of the economic slump; notes the statistics from the Airdrie bureau that indicate that debt-related inquiries have increased by 50% since last winter and those related to redundancy have increased by 1,200%, and acknowledges the important and unique role of citizens advice bureaux in offering information and advice services, run and provided mainly by local volunteers, to communities throughout Scotland.

S3M-3338 Hugh O’Donnell: Airdrie Citizens Advice Bureau Award—That the Parliament congratulates the committee, volunteers and staff of Airdrie Citizens Advice Bureau, which has recently been awarded the Scottish Standards Accreditation certificate by the Scottish Government for excellence in delivering advice in three areas, housing, money and welfare benefits; acknowledges the value of its free, independent and high-standard services at a time when applications for help from members of the public are increasing substantially because of the economic slump; notes the statistics from the Airdrie bureau that indicate that debt-related inquiries have increased by 50% since last winter and those related to redundancy have increased by 1,200%, and acknowledges the important and unique role of citizens advice bureaux in offering information and advice services, run and provided mainly by local volunteers, to communities throughout Scotland.
